tier_1.notes: Weak tier, uncommon in end-game content

tier_2.notes: STRONGEST tier, CRITICAL for survivability (Clan Boss, dungeons). This is the GOLD STANDARD debuff for defense.

effect.description: Reduces target's ATK by X%, reducing ALL damage dealt by target. CRITICAL for survivability in sustained fights (Clan Boss, long dungeon boss fights).
effect.landing_process: 2-step: (1) Skill base chance (varies), (2) ACC vs RES check ((ACC - RES + 200) / 400, capped 0-95%)
effect.notes: Decrease ATK is MULTIPLICATIVE damage reduction from boss. 50% ATK reduction = boss deals 50% damage (halves boss damage). CRITICAL for team survivability.

damage_reduction_calculation.formula: Boss damage = Base Damage × (1 - Decrease ATK%)

unm_clan_boss_base_aoe_turn_50.notes: UNM Clan Boss turn 50 AOE: 15,000 base × 2.5 scaling = 37,500 damage per champion. Without Decrease ATK, team takes 187,500 total damage per AOE (5 champions × 37,500).

decrease_atk_25_percent.notes: Decrease ATK 25%: Boss deals 75% damage (37,500 × 0.75 = 28,125 per champion). Team takes 140,625 total damage per AOE. 25% damage reduction. MODERATE survivability increase.

decrease_atk_50_percent.notes: Decrease ATK 50%: Boss deals 50% damage (37,500 × 0.50 = 18,750 per champion). Team takes 93,750 total damage per AOE. 50% damage reduction. CRITICAL survivability increase (halves boss damage).

stag_knight.notes: Stag Knight A2 is PREMIUM Decrease ATK 50% skill. Also applies Decrease DEF 60% (dual debuff). 90% base chance × 72.5% ACC/RES (350 ACC vs 300 RES) = 65.25% land rate. 2-turn duration, 4-turn CD = 26.1% uptime. LOW uptime, but MASSIVE impact when active (boss damage halved).

jareg.notes: Jareg A1 is PREMIUM Decrease ATK 50% skill. 75% base chance, 0-turn CD (can apply every turn). With 350 ACC (72.5% land rate), expected uptime is 109% (capped at 100% due to overlapping 2-turn debuffs). Near-perfect uptime. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Clan Boss survivability.

tayrel.notes: Tayrel A1 is PREMIUM Decrease DEF 60% + Decrease ATK 25% skill. 100% base chance, 0-turn CD (can apply every turn). With 350 ACC (72.5% land rate), expected uptime is 145% (capped at 100%). Near-perfect uptime for both debuffs. NOTE: Only 25% ATK reduction (weaker than 50% for survivability, but still VALUABLE).

strategy_1_high_acc.acc_impact: 350 ACC vs 300 RES = 72.5% land rate. 390 ACC vs 300 RES = 97.5% land rate (+25% land rate = +25% uptime).
strategy_1_high_acc.notes: ACC is CRITICAL for Decrease ATK uptime. Stag Knight with 390 ACC (vs 350 ACC) increases uptime from 26.1% → 35% (+34% relative increase). Gaps in Decrease ATK uptime = team wipe (boss damage spikes).

strategy_2_low_cd_skills.notes: Low CD skills are PREMIUM for uptime. Jareg A1 (0-turn CD) achieves 100% uptime. Stag Knight A2 (4-turn CD) achieves only 26-35% uptime. If possible, use champion with A1 Decrease ATK (Jareg, Tayrel) for 100% uptime. CRITICAL for survivability (gaps in Decrease ATK = team wipe).

strategy_3_master_hexer.effect: 30% chance to extend debuff duration by 1 turn
strategy_3_master_hexer.notes: Master Hexer is HIGH VALUE for Decrease ATK champions with 4-turn CD. Extends 2-turn duration → 3-turn duration (30% of time), increasing uptime by 30%. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Stag Knight, etc. Gaps in Decrease ATK uptime = team wipe (boss damage spikes).

strategy_4_multiple_sources.secondary_source: Stag Knight A2 (26-35% uptime, also applies Decrease DEF 60%)
strategy_4_multiple_sources.notes: If Decrease ATK uptime is <100%, STRONGLY CONSIDER adding secondary source. Gaps in Decrease ATK = boss damage spikes = potential team wipe. Jareg A1 (100% uptime) + Stag Knight A2 (also Decrease DEF 60%) = 100% Decrease ATK uptime + 26% Decrease DEF uptime.

clan_boss.survivability_impact: Halves boss damage. Turn 50 AOE damage drops from 37,500 → 18,750 per champion. Team survival increases from ~45 turns (no Decrease ATK) → ~60+ turns (with Decrease ATK 50%).
clan_boss.priority: HIGHEST PRIORITY debuff for survivability (even higher than Increase DEF, shields)
clan_boss.uptime_criticality: 100% uptime CRITICAL. Gaps in Decrease ATK = boss damage spikes = potential team wipe. Use A1 Decrease ATK champion (Jareg, Tayrel) for 100% uptime.
clan_boss.notes: Decrease ATK 50% is CRITICAL for Clan Boss survivability. Without it, team struggles to survive past turn 45-50 (boss damage scaling too high). With it, team survives 60+ turns (enables 2-key, 1-key damage thresholds).

dungeons.wave_clear_impact: Minimal (waves die fast, survivability not critical)
dungeons.boss_impact: HIGH VALUE for long boss fights (Fire Knight, Spider, Ice Golem). Reduces boss damage by 50%, increasing team survival.
dungeons.notes: Decrease ATK 50% is HIGH VALUE for dungeon boss fights (especially Fire Knight waves, Spider waves with high damage). Less critical for wave clear (waves die fast).

arena.speed_impact: Arena is speed-based (first team to nuke wins). Decrease ATK 50% is DEFENSIVE strategy (reduces enemy team nuke damage).
arena.notes: Decrease ATK 50% is NICHE for Arena (defensive teams, stall teams). Most Arena teams focus on speed + nuke (kill enemy team before they move). Decrease ATK is NOT priority for offensive Arena teams.

faction_wars.wave_clear_impact: HIGH VALUE for high-difficulty waves (Faction Wars 21 waves can one-shot champions). Reduces wave damage by 50%.
faction_wars.boss_impact: CRITICAL for boss kills (bosses hit HARD in Faction Wars 21). Reduces boss damage by 50%.
faction_wars.notes: Decrease ATK 50% is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Faction Wars (especially stages 18-21). Waves and bosses hit HARD. Decrease ATK 50% is often difference between success and failure.

increase_def_60.description: Increase DEF 60% boosts team DEF by 1.6×, reducing damage taken. Stacks MULTIPLICATIVELY with Decrease ATK 50% (0.5 damage from boss × 0.6 damage taken = 0.3 effective damage, 70% total damage reduction).
increase_def_60.notes: Increase DEF + Decrease ATK is PREMIUM buff/debuff combo for survivability. Total damage reduction 70% (team takes ONLY 30% of boss damage). HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Clan Boss, Faction Wars.

ally_protection.description: Ally Protection redirects damage from weak champions to tanky champion. Stacks with Decrease ATK 50% (tanky champion takes 50% damage, then redirects to self). PREMIUM survivability combo.
ally_protection.notes: Ally Protection + Decrease ATK is TOP TIER survivability combo. Tanky champion takes ALL damage (redirected) at 50% reduction. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Clan Boss (protect weak DPS champions).

shield.description: Shield absorbs damage before HP. Stacks with Decrease ATK 50% (boss deals 50% damage, then shield absorbs remainder). PREMIUM survivability combo.
shield.notes: Shield + Decrease ATK is TOP TIER survivability combo. Boss damage halved, then shield absorbs remainder. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Clan Boss (Brogni shields + Decrease ATK = team survives 60+ turns).

mistake_1_low_acc.mistake: Building Decrease ATK champion with low ACC (e.g., 200 ACC)
mistake_1_low_acc.impact: 200 ACC vs 300 RES = 25% land rate. Stag Knight A2 uptime drops from 26.1% (350 ACC) to 6.5% (200 ACC). Gaps in Decrease ATK = boss damage spikes = team wipe. CRITICAL survivability loss.
mistake_1_low_acc.solution: Build Decrease ATK champions with 350-390 ACC for reliable landing. ACC is CRITICAL stat (even more important than SPD for debuff champions). Gaps in Decrease ATK uptime = potential team wipe.

mistake_2_using_low_tier_decrease_atk.mistake: Using Decrease ATK 25% instead of Decrease ATK 50%
mistake_2_using_low_tier_decrease_atk.impact: Decrease ATK 25% = 25% damage reduction (vs 50% for 50%). Boss damage drops from 37,500 → 28,125 (vs 18,750 for 50%). Team takes 33% MORE damage (28,125 vs 18,750). SIGNIFICANT survivability loss.
mistake_2_using_low_tier_decrease_atk.solution: ALWAYS prioritize Decrease ATK 50% champions (Stag Knight, Jareg). Do NOT use Decrease ATK 25% champions in end-game content (unless no better option available). Tayrel A1 is ACCEPTABLE (25% ATK reduction + 60% DEF reduction = dual debuff value).

mistake_3_not_taking_master_hexer.mistake: Not taking Master Hexer T6 on Decrease ATK champion (Stag Knight)
mistake_3_not_taking_master_hexer.impact: Stag Knight A2 uptime drops from 34% (with Master Hexer) to 26.1% (without). Gaps in Decrease ATK increase from 66% → 74% (more boss damage spikes). MODERATE survivability loss.
mistake_3_not_taking_master_hexer.solution: ALWAYS take Master Hexer T6 on Decrease ATK champions with 4-turn CD (Stag Knight). +30% uptime = fewer gaps in Decrease ATK = fewer team wipes.

mistake_4_gaps_in_decrease_atk_uptime.mistake: Relying on single Decrease ATK source with <100% uptime (e.g., Stag Knight A2 only, 26% uptime)
mistake_4_gaps_in_decrease_atk_uptime.impact: Gaps in Decrease ATK = boss damage spikes. Turn 50 AOE damage spikes from 18,750 (with Decrease ATK) → 37,500 (without). DOUBLE damage. Team wipes during gaps.
mistake_4_gaps_in_decrease_atk_uptime.solution: Use A1 Decrease ATK champion (Jareg, Tayrel) for 100% uptime. If using 4-turn CD champion (Stag Knight), ADD secondary Decrease ATK source OR use Ally Protection / shields to survive gaps.

mistake_5_confusing_decrease_atk_with_in.mistake: Thinking Decrease ATK and Increase DEF are equivalent (both reduce damage taken)
mistake_5_confusing_decrease_atk_with_in.impact: Decrease ATK 50% = 50% damage reduction (boss deals HALF damage). Increase DEF 60% = ~40% damage reduction (team takes ~60% damage). Decrease ATK is STRONGER per debuff. Both stack multiplicatively (use both for 70% total damage reduction).
mistake_5_confusing_decrease_atk_with_in.solution: Understand Decrease ATK is STRONGER per debuff (50% vs 40%). Use BOTH debuffs if possible (Decrease ATK 50% + Increase DEF 60% = 70% total damage reduction). PREMIUM survivability combo.

metadata.validation: Cross-referenced with in-game testing (Stag Knight survivability validation), community calculators, damage reduction formula
metadata.notes: Comprehensive Decrease ATK mechanics for team building and survivability optimization. CRITICAL FINDING: Decrease ATK 50% is HIGHEST PRIORITY debuff for survivability (halves boss damage, enables 60+ turn survival vs 45 turns without). 100% uptime CRITICAL (gaps = team wipe).
